titles.title: All That I Am I Owe to Thee

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All that I am I owe to Thee; Thy wisdom, Lord, has fashioned me. I give my Maker thankful praise, whose wondrous works my soul amaze.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Ere into being I was brought, Thine eye did see, and in Thy thought my life in all its perfect plan was ordered ere my days began.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thy thoughts, O God, how manifold, more precious unto me than gold! I muse on their infinity, awaking I am still with Thee.

verse.name: v4
v5
